page.title: 15Country Life, N.Alcester
page.content: I am Paul and I enjoy living in the country. One of my hobbies is gardening. I have a little patch of my own and I am growing vegetables in it. I like going fishing for one of my hobbies. Once I caught a trout. I took it home and cooked it for my tea. When my dad comes home I help him feed our two goats. I keep them in a little pen. We wouldn't be able to keep goats in a town because they smell too much. Ducks come on the stream at the bottom of our garden and we feed them with left-over bread. Because I live in the country my mum drives me to cubs and dad picks me up again. I have to go to school by car as well. I like the country at night because it is very quiet, but I watch a lot of television.
